09-12-2024: - Added {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rebirth|Size=20} Rebirth channel and revive sounds
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: No longer grants 20% Weapon Damage
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Cooldown Reduction reduced from 18% to 15%
08-29-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Cooldown reduction increased from +15% to +18%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Now grants +12 Spirit
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Fixed being able to purchase globally during its brief respawn period
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Fixed the camera moving away from the player if you will respawn, rather than following the ragdoll
08-15-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Rebirth Health increased from 40% to 50%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Cooldown reduced from 240s to 200s
08-01-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth: Cooldown reduction increased from 10% to 15%
07-18-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Rebirth|Size=20} Soul Rebirth (new T4 Vitality item): After you die, you will respawn in 4 seconds where you died with 40% of your Max Health. Cooldown: 220s. Also innately grants +20% Weapon Damage and +10% Cooldown Reduction.
